column3:
Qhoterl Pasol faces an unprecedented dilemma: a disastrous deluge of dead deer delicacies.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested items to Qhoterl Pasol.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine splendid rock salt in the K'mul Astropolis<Else/>Deliver the splendid rock salt to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather splendid tree bark in the K'mul Astropolis<Else/>Deliver the splendid tree bark to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Spearfish a splendid Night's bass in the depths of Lake Tusi Mek'ta<Else/>Deliver the splendid Night's bass to Qhoterl Pasol</If><Else/></If></If></If>.

Our Viis friends have presented us with an enormous haul of venison as a sign of their appreciation for our work. The only problem is, there's so much of it, we'll need to smoke the meat before it goes rotten!
Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to bring me some rock salt? Sprinkling it on the meat beforehand draws out the rich, gamey flavors!
Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to bring me some tree bark? Naturally, only the most splendid will suffice.
Could I be awfully impertinent and ask you to spear me a Night's bass? It may not be the most obvious choice, but apparently, smoking it together with the deer meat helps to preserve it.
If I could tear myself away from my duties here, I'd probably start by searching around the K'mul Astropolis. Something about the place simply screams “splendid,” wouldn't you agree?
If I could tear myself away from my duties here, I'd probably start by searching around the K'mul Astropolis. Something about the place simply screams “splendid,” wouldn't you agree?
If I could tear myself away from my duties here, and I had even the slightest inkling of how spearfishing works, I'd probably try my luck at Lake Tusi Mek'ta.
In order to proceed with this quest, you must first complete the quest “A New Fishing Ex-spear-ience” and unlock spearfishing.
Have you brought that which I requested? Time is of the essence!
My word, this is splendid! Just the fragrance alone makes me want to gobble it all up, even without the venison...
Ah, of course, that would rather defeat the purpose of having you rush around before the meat spoils. And we wouldn't want the Viis' generous gift to go to waste, now, would we?
